comments:
Description:
After clicking the Margin item in Master Page, an exception occurrs.

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a Report file.
2. Click the Master Page item.
3. Click the Margin item in Property Editor.

Expected result:
Show correct performance without exceptions.

Actual result:
An unexpected internal exception dialog occurrs.

Error logs:
org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.core.runtime.GUIException: Caused by java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException.
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.core.runtime.GUIException.createGUIException(GUIException.java:76)

This regerssion bug is caused by missing the "spinnerPropertyDescriptor" which is removed on replacing the BIRT spinner with SWT spinner. Fixed it by adding the new "spinnerPropertyDescriptor" using SWT spinner.

(In reply to comment #1)
> This regerssion bug is caused by missing the "spinnerPropertyDescriptor" which
> is removed on replacing the BIRT spinner with SWT spinner. Fixed it by adding
> the new "spinnerPropertyDescriptor" using SWT spinner.

closed
